verses.1: Mi liante tawh an nekhawm dingin na tut uh ciangin na tut pih pa limtakin en un.
verses.2: An a ngaklah thei mi na hih khak uh leh zong limtakin kidawm un.
verses.3: Hong thangsiahna hi kha thei ding ahih manin tua anlimte lunggulh pah lua kei un.
verses.4: Hauh nop man bekin sumʼ sila suak kei unla, a man loin gamta kha kei un.
verses.5: Na ngah sa uh sumte mitphiat kalin bei mang thei a, muvanlai bangin thakhatin leeng mang thei hi.
verses.6: A cil tentan miteʼ an neksak kei unla, a anlimte uh duhgawh kha kei un.
verses.7: “Nene un,” hong cih hangin a cih takpi hi lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh na dangtawng a hong sun samzang nekkhak tawh kibang ding hi.
verses.8: Na nek sa teng uh na lua khiakik ding uh a, na kamsiam ngah teeng uh maimang ta ding hi.
verses.9: Mihaite pil hopih kei un; amaute in a manphatna phawk thei lo uh hi.
verses.10: Tanglai gisuang khiin kei unla, tagahteʼ leitang va keek kei un.
verses.11: Amaute a pawlpih pa pen Topa hi a, noteʼ lang khat ah amaute panpih ding hi.
verses.12: Hong kihilhnate zui unla, pilna thu hong kigente ngai un.
verses.13: Naupangte sat ding lunghiang kei un; satna hangin si lo ding hi.
verses.14: Ciangduai tawh sat le-uhcin nuntak lawh zaw ding uh hi.
verses.15: Ka ta aw, mipil suak lecin ka lungdam mahmah ding hi.
verses.16: Thuman na gen ciangin ka nuam mahmah ding hi.
verses.17: Mawhnei mite eng kha kei inla, Topa zahtakna zom paisuak in.
verses.18: Tua bang hi lecin lametna om a, cithei-in na khansau ding hi.
verses.19: Ka ta aw, ka thu ngai inla, mipil suak in; lampi man zuih ding ngaihsutpi-in nei in.
verses.20: Zu nenete tawh kikhawl kei inla, a uisante tawh kithuah kha kei in.
verses.21: Zu nenete le a uisante zawng ding uh a, a ne bek a nitumte in puan sia bek silh zo ding hi.
verses.22: Nangma pianna na paʼ thu ngai inla, na nu a teek ciangin simmawh bawl kei in.
verses.23: Thuman, pilna, siamna, thungaihsut theihna lei in; zuak khiat dingin tuate pammaih lua hi.
verses.24: Ta hoih a nei pa a lung dam dinga, ta pil a nei pa a taʼ tungah lungkim ding hi.
verses.25: Na nu le na pa a kipak nadingin gamta inla, na pianna nu lungdamsak in.
verses.26: Ka ta aw, ka thugente ciamteh inla, keima gamtat bangin nang zong gamta in.
verses.27: Numei paktatte pen kiat theih nading gum tawh kibang a, numei gina lote pen tangciak theihna hawkguam tawh kibang hi.
verses.28: Gutate bangin nang hong buk sim a, mi tampi tak siasak uh hi.
verses.29: Kuate in gal nei a, kuate in dahna thuak hiam? Thu om lopi-in kuate liam a, thu om lopi-in kuate a mit san gega hiam?
verses.30: Zu ne-a a tut khote zu a nenete ahi hi.
verses.31: Hai sungah a phuan seuhseuh gawl sungah a tum suk hithit thei leenggahzu san et-in nei kei in.
verses.32: A tawpna ah gulpi bangin nang hong tu dinga, gul gu nei in a tuk na bang ding hi.
verses.33: Na mitah na lam dangdang hong suak dinga, hoihtakin na pau thei nawn kei ding hi.
verses.34: Tuipi tungah a lum tawh na kibang dinga, a suk awn a to awn teembaw dawna tuang tawh na kibang ding hi.
verses.35: “Hong vuak hangun ka liam kei a, hong sat hangun ka phawk kei hi. Ka pilvang ciangin zu ka nekik ding hi,” na ci ding hi.
